nodes.documentation:
Redeems favorable outcome shares (long winning outcome/short losing outcome(s)) for a closed market
@param marketId Market ID
nodes.name: redeemFavorableOutcomeShares
getMarketOutcomeShareTokenBalance
getTotalMintedOutcomeShareTokens
calculateProfitPerFavorableOutcomeShareToken
addAdmin
removeAdmin

params.ipfsHash: Hash of betting market details pushed to IPFS
params.marketType: Type of market to open - one side or p2p
params.maxBet: Maximum amount in DBETs to bet
params.minBet: Minimum amount in DBETs to bet
params.outcomes: All possible outcomes to bet on

createBettingMarket(uint8,uint256,uint25.return: bytes32 Unique ID for betting market

setBettingExchange(address).return: bool whether exchange address was updated

addAdmin(address).notice: Adds an admin to the market contract

calculateProfitPerFavorableOutcomeShareT.notice: Calculate profit per favorable outcome share token and calculate profit

getMarketOutcomeAtIndex(bytes32,uint256).notice: Returns market outcomes for a market by ID at index

getMarketOutcomeCount(bytes32).notice: Returns market outcome count for a market by ID

getMarketOutcomeShareToken(bytes32,bytes.notice: Returns address for an outcome share token based on it's name
Returns address for an outcome share token based on it's outcome type

getMarketOutcomeShareTokenBalance(bytes3.notice: Returns user balance for an outcome share token

getMarketOutcomeShareTokenName(bytes32,b.notice: Returns name for an outcome share token

getTotalMintedOutcomeShareTokens(bytes32.notice: Returns total minted outcome share tokens for a market

redeemFavorableOutcomeShares(bytes32).notice: Redeems favorable outcome shares (long winning outcome/short losing outcome(s)) for a closed market

removeAdmin(address).notice: Removes an admin from the market contract

resolveMarket(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Resolves a market with a winning outcome
